name: Marwin the wizard and the nazi bombing owl
name_original: Marwin the wizard and the nazi bombing owl
description:
Use WASD keys to move around.
Press SPACE to use smoke and hide from the towers. Press E to throw bomb.
Have fun destroying the nazi regime.

BUG: We've got a bug that disables the tower in the built version of the game. Working on a fix ASAP.
